summary: This document consists of multiple AT&T wireless subscriber information records for Scott Borgerson, showing him as the financial liable party for several phone lines/accounts, some associated with names like 'G MAX' and 'G WIFI'. It appears to be a law enforcement or investigative request for subscriber data.

keyFacts: Scott Borgerson has been an AT&T customer since March 13, 2004, and is the financial liable party for multiple wireless accounts.
Several AT&T wireless lines are associated with generic user names like 'G MAX' and 'G WIFI', all financially backed by Scott Borgerson.
One specific line is listed under the name 'Scott G Borgerson', activated on July 22, 2007, with Scott Borgerson as the financial party.
The document is dated June 17, 2020, and appears to be a production of subscriber information, likely for investigative purposes related to the Epstein case.
The records show a pattern of Scott Borgerson financially responsible for multiple phone lines, some under his name and others under ambiguous identifiers.
